verses.text: How long, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? Will You forget me forever? How long will You hide \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* face from me?

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* must \w I|strong="H5704"\w* wrestle \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart each day? \w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy dominate \w me|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Consider|strong="H7896"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3119"\w* respond, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w Give|strong="H7311"\w* light \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyes, lest \w I|strong="H5704"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*,

\w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy say, “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* overcome \w him|strong="H6030"\w*,” \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes rejoice \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* fall.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* loving devotion; \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w will|strong="H6862"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
